actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization for the low income housing program.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts to provide a specified amount of contributions for lower income housing projects during FY 1983. Limits the aggregate amount that may be obligated over the life of such contracts. Earmarks a specified portion of such authority for improvement assistance for existing projects. Authorizes appropriations for public housing operating subsidies for FY 1983.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization for the low income housing program.
